data.text: @JEM_NYC @RepMalliotakis Except it isn't. Your gaslight is dying.

@RepMalliotakis Today you again showed your disdain for the LGBTQ community by not boycotting in protest against their unconscionable exclusion from the parade. Adding an emoji for a group not allowed to walk is not going to cut it either. There's a special place in hell for you, Nicole.
@RepMalliotakis Nicole, to much of a photo op for u to refuse to parade, as many politicos did (even some Repub), bc of the parade leader’s discrimination against LGBTQ+ community?
